title: DDFP 245: Twitter Q & A
itunes:title: DDFP 245: Twitter Q & A
description:
Shek and Handsome Hank are joined by @NFL_ATL's Chris Wesseling and Tom Brady (NFL media boss, not the Patriots QB) to tackle twitter questions from the listeners. Topics include: most disappointing team this offseason, the prettiest play in sports, player with the best name and much more. Plus, the guys ponder if the Washington Redskins and DeSean Jackson are a good match before a "Games of Thrones" Season 4 preview discussion wraps the show. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
